name: 陳儀
objective:
本課程專為僑生、港澳生所設計，透過文學選讀、當代文本議題討論以及文學創意寫作，培養學生中文理解、溝通表達及鑑賞能力，同時也深化對於文化、世界及自我生命的認識。此外，課程也將結合實務應用，幫助學生提升職場中文應用能力。
This course is specifically designed for overseas Chinese and Hong Kong-Macau students. Through the study of literary works, discussions on contemporary textual issues, and creative literary writing, it aims to develop students' Chinese comprehension, communication, and appreciation skills while deepening their understanding of culture, the world, and their own lives. Additionally, the course incorporates practical applications to enhance students' proficiency in using Chinese in professional settings.
